/software/cuda-11.6/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/ISP.dir/src/isp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ISP.dir/include/confini.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ISP.dir/include/isp_pipeline.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ISP.dir/include/utils.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/ISP.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/software/cuda-11.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/software/cuda-11.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /software/cuda-11.6/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl  libISP_CUDA.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
